Key Match Events: Cody Bellinger hit a two-run home run off Buehler four batters into the game.
Michael Busch added a home run among four hits and three RBIs as the Cubs found some offense to earn a 10-4 victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts noted Buehler’s improvement as the game went on but acknowledged command issues.
Buehler expressed that the first inning was a weird thing for him this year and that it was hard for the rest of the team to dig him out of a hole every game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shohei Ohtani’s 47th stolen base as he inched closer to the first 50-50 season in MLB history.
Others: Cubs managed to score just two total runs during a three-game series against the New York Yankees this past weekend.
The Cubs were shut out both Friday and Saturday before a 2-1 victory Sunday.
